item.description: arXiv:2511.11793v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We present MiroThinker v1.0, an open-source research agent designed to advance tool-augmented reasoning and information-seeking capabilities. item.description: arXiv:2511.11810v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Language models (LMs) are said to be exhibiting reasoning, but what does this entail?
